basic.description: This is the first of two laboratory courses in the third year of the General Option of the Mechanical Engineering program.  Lecture topics and course assignments are selected to provide the background required to undertake the laboratory work. Lab modules from MECH 396/397/399 completed but not counted for credit may be included for credit in this course.
basic.subject: MECH
basic.title: Mech Eng Lab I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Must be registered in a BSCE program
